Coin Modules

Here is a list of all modules:
  • Actions
  • Base classes
  • Bundles (mostly for internal use)
  • Cache storage (mostly for internal use)
  • Collision detections between scene geometry
  • Detail classes
  • Draggers
  • Elements (mostly for internal use)
  • Engine classes
  • Error handling
  • Event classes
  • Field classes
  • General classes
  • Support for vectorized printing
  • Manipulators
  • Node Kits
  • Nodes
  • Projector classes (mostly for internal use)
  • Sensor classes
  • 3D sound support
  • Portable thread-handling abstractions
  • VRML97 classes
